Html:
I was wondering if anyone know's what the main differences between the chart control included in the WPF Toolkit and the

chart control in the D3 (http://dynamicdatadisplay.codeplex.com/) project.

I'd like to know that too ;)

It seems to me a bit that the D3 is a bit more general approach (is it?) so more coding is needed than with the toolkit chart control - but the possibilities are greater....

Well I want to use a chart control and I'm not quite sure which to use... maybe the toolkit chart control because I expect that there will be more development and documentation with that...

But maybe there is somebody who really knows this stuff and is not just guessing ;)

 

Thank you.

ernii
